security.title: Security
security.content: Development funds are hosted by an open source, secure smart contract on the chain, so you never have to worry about collecting money.

credible.title: Credibleness
credible.content: SBT (Soul Bound Token) tracks project development and eliminates false resumes.

openness.title: Openness
openness.content: With no licensing, no censorship, and token payments, you can publish your projects with confidence anytime, anywhere.

item1.title: Find developer
item1.p1: As a project owner, you are free to publish tasks.
item1.p3: Once a partnership is established, the tokens are hosted in a smart contract.

item2.title: Find tasks
item2.p1: As a developer, you can search for tasks that are right for you.
item2.p2: Estimated development fees obtained at the time of registration.
item2.p3: Once the collaboration is established, the developers do their best to complete the task.
item2.p4: Complete tasks, earn SBT, and build trust.

item1.content: Detask is the best partner for Web3 development and I can always find the right person to complete my projects.

item2.content: I have always wanted to participate in the Web3 project, but I need a good search portal. Thank God, here it is! For those who want to participate in the Web3 project, this is really good.

item3.content: Detask - the Web3 community with Efficient, Fair, Credible and Valuable. Without the help of Detask, I might not find such suitable and capable talent to complete the project and achieve my goal.
